``` {r}
library(tidyverse)
library(Lahman)
library(rvest)

url <- "https://www.baseball-reference.com/awards/hof_2025.shtml"
br_hof <- read_html(url)
br_df <- html_table(br_hof)[[1]]

colnames(br_df) <- br_df[1, ]
br_df <- br_df[-1, ]
hof <- HallOfFame

head(br_df)
```
